languages.text: {n}Женщина заходится гортанным пьяным смехом.{/n} "Прости, старик... голоса столь громки, что я и сама себя не слышу! Визжат, поют... о, Абеляр, как они поют!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Женщина заходится гортанным пьяным смехом.{/n} "Прости, старик... голоса столь громки, что я и сама себя не слышу! Визжат, поют... о, Абеляр, как они поют!"

languages.text: {n}The woman bursts into guttural, drunken laughter.{/n} "Sorry, old man — the voices are so loud I can't even hear myself! They shriek, they sing, they— oh, Abelard, how they sing!"
languages.original_text: {n}Женщина заходится гортанным пьяным смехом.{/n} "Прости, старик... голоса столь громки, что я и сама себя не слышу! Визжат, поют... о, Абеляр, как они поют!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The woman bursts into guttural, drunken laughter.{/n} "Sorry, old man — the voices are so loud I can't even hear myself! They shriek, they sing, they... Oh, Abelard, how they sing!"
{n}The woman bursts into guttural, drunken laughter.{/n} "Sorry, old man — the voices are so loud I can't even hear myself! They shriek, they sing, they... Oh, Abelard, how they sing!"
{n}The woman bursts into guttural, drunken laughter.{/n} "Sorry, old man — the voices are so loud I can't even hear myself! They shriek, they sing, they— oh, Abelard, how they sing!"
{n}The woman bursts into guttural, drunken laughter.{/n} "Sorry, old man — the voices are so loud I can't even hear myself! They shriek, they sing, they— oh, Abelard, how they sing!"
{n}The woman bursts into guttural, drunken laughter.{/n} "Sorry, old man — the voices are so loud I can't even hear myself! They shriek, they sing, they — oh, Abelard, how they sing!"

languages.text: {n}那个女人爆发出了粗声粗气的笑声，仿佛喝醉了一样。{/n}“抱歉，老家伙——那些声音太吵了，我都没听到我自己说了什么！它们尖叫着，还唱着歌——噢，阿贝拉德，它们唱得可真热闹！”
languages.original_text: {n}The woman bursts into guttural, drunken laughter.{/n} "Sorry, old man — the voices are so loud I can't even hear myself! They shriek, they sing, they— oh, Abelard, how they sing!"

traits.locale_text: {n}那个女人爆发出了粗声粗气的笑声，仿佛喝醉了一样。{/n}“抱歉，老家伙——那些声音太吵了，我都没听到我自己说了什么！它们尖叫着，还唱着歌——噢，阿贝拉德，它们唱得可真热闹！”

languages.text: {n}La mujer rompe a reír con una risa gutural y ebria.{/n} «Lo siento, anciano; ¡las voces son tan fuertes que no puedo oír ni mis palabras! Chillan, cantan... ¡oh, Abelard, cómo cantan!».
languages.original_text: {n}The woman bursts into guttural, drunken laughter.{/n} "Sorry, old man — the voices are so loud I can't even hear myself! They shriek, they sing, they— oh, Abelard, how they sing!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La mujer rompe a reír con una risa gutural y ebria.{/n} «Lo siento, anciano; ¡las voces son tan fuertes que no puedo oír ni mis palabras! Chillan, cantan... ¡oh, Abelard, cómo cantan!».

languages.text: {n}女は突然、低く酔っ払ったような笑い声をあげる。{/n}「ごめんなさい、おじちゃん。声がうるさすぎて、自分の声さえ聞こえないの！やつらは金切り声を上げ、歌い、やつらは…アベラルド、あいつらの歌声に耳を塞ぐことができない！」
languages.original_text: {n}The woman bursts into guttural, drunken laughter.{/n} "Sorry, old man — the voices are so loud I can't even hear myself! They shriek, they sing, they— oh, Abelard, how they sing!"

traits.locale_text: {n}女は突然大声で笑い出した。酔っ払いの笑いだ。{/n}「ごめんなさい、おじいさん — 声が大きすぎて自分の声さえ聞こえない！やつらは金切り声を上げ、歌い、やつらは…アベラルド、あいつらどうやって謳うんだろう？」
{n}女は突然、低く酔っ払ったような笑い声をあげる。{/n}「ごめんなさい、おじちゃん。声がうるさすぎて、自分の声さえ聞こえないの！やつらは金切り声を上げ、歌い、やつらは…アベラルド、あいつらの歌声に耳を塞ぐことができない！」

languages.original_text: {n}The woman bursts into guttural, drunken laughter.{/n} "Sorry, old man — the voices are so loud I can't even hear myself! They shriek, they sing, they— oh, Abelard, how they sing!"

languages.text: {n}La femme éclate d'un rire guttural, comme ivre.{/n} « Désolée, vieillard ; les voix sont si fortes que c'est à peine si je m'entends parler ! Elles hurlent, elles chantent... Oh, Abélard ! Vous n'imaginez pas comme elles chantent ! »
languages.original_text: {n}The woman bursts into guttural, drunken laughter.{/n} "Sorry, old man — the voices are so loud I can't even hear myself! They shriek, they sing, they— oh, Abelard, how they sing!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La femme éclate d'un rire guttural, comme ivre.{/n} « Désolée, vieillard ; les voix sont si fortes que c'est à peine si je m'entends parler ! Elles hurlent, elles chantent... Oh, Abélard ! Vous n'imaginez pas comme elles chantent ! »

languages.text: {n}Die Frau lacht kehlig, fast betrunken.{/n} "Verzeiht, alter Mann – die Stimmen sind so laut, ich höre mich selbst kaum! Sie kreischen, sie singen, sie ... Oh, Abelard, wie sie singen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The woman bursts into guttural, drunken laughter.{/n} "Sorry, old man — the voices are so loud I can't even hear myself! They shriek, they sing, they— oh, Abelard, how they sing!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Frau lacht kehlig, fast betrunken.{/n} "Verzeiht, alter Mann – die Stimmen sind so laut, ich höre mich selbst kaum! Sie kreischen, sie singen, sie ... Oh, Abelard, wie sie singen!"

languages.text: {n}Kadın, gırtlaktan gelen bir sarhoş kahkahası patlatıyor.{/n} "Kusura bakma ihtiyar, sesler o kadar yüksek ki kendimi bile duyamıyorum! Bazen feryat ediyorlar, bazen şarkı söylüyorlar, bazen de... Ah Abelard, o şarkıları bir duysan!"
languages.original_text: {n}The woman bursts into guttural, drunken laughter.{/n} "Sorry, old man — the voices are so loud I can't even hear myself! They shriek, they sing, they— oh, Abelard, how they sing!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Kadın, gırtlaktan gelen bir sarhoş kahkahası patlatıyor.{/n} "Kusura bakma ihtiyar, sesler o kadar yüksek ki kendimi bile duyamıyorum! Bazen feryat ediyorlar, bazen şarkı söylüyorlar, bazen de... Ah Abelard, o şarkıları bir duysan!"
